Package game.summoners

Class Invader

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.summoners.Summoners
game.summoners.Invader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
public class Invader
extends Summoners
Invader is a subclass of Summoners representing an enemy summoner character that invades the game world. The Invader has various behaviors and roles that determine its actions during the game. Invader can be summoned in SummonSign. Created by:

  • Field Summary

      public Invader​(Actor player)

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Overrides the playTurn method from the Summoners class to determine the action to be performed by the Invader on its turn. The Invader can add follow behaviors, attack behaviors, and check if the player or other enemies are nearby.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Summoners
      Parameters:
      actions - the list of possible actions for the Invader
      lastAction - the last action performed by the Invader
      map - the current game map
      display - the display object for rendering the game
      Returns:
      the chosen action to be performed by the Invader

    • generateRole

      public RoleAbstract generateRole()
      Generates a random role for the Invader from a predefined set of available roles.
      Specified by:
      generateRole in class Summoners
      Returns:
      the generated RoleAbstract object representing the role of the Invader

    • generateRunes

      public void generateRunes()
      Generates a random number of runes
